40.title: Crash into the start of the falling tree.

96.title: After the climb up and plate slide, fall down into the piece.

86.title: Drive into the plant, first with your backwheel.

67.title: Climb up to the top and drive backwards before the next checkpoint, fall down and get the piece.

60.title: Over the finish line, at first explode the barrels and then climb up to the piece.

85.title: Jump with the tree and get the piece.

62.title: Jump not with the wing drive over the wheel.

9.title: Drive as fast as you can into the loop.

99.title: Drive into the loop one and on the top drive backwards.

1.title: After the lookout point and before the last big jump.

58.title: After the second jump gettin under the steal.

7.title: After the big jump in the fire.

20.title: Drive with fast speed into the loop and gettin over the catch.

28.title: Before finish line, break before and fall backwards into the piece.

4.title: Jump high over the jump in the cave.

102.title: That's really tricky. Crash with your rider into the wood and fall over the big rock.

55.title: Jump slow onto first barrel and fall inot the piece.
